div.bibl: Vukodlak Vol. I, No. 2, July 15, 1937. INDEPENDENT CROATIAN LABOR DAILY

body.p: Anybody who sends his address to the undersigned will receive a free copy of Hrvatska Zastava on trial, in which he will find details of our contest.
Hrvatska Zastava is an independent workers' daily which brings news daily and the full truth about them, as they really are.
Please send all correspondence, questions and orders to Hrvatska Zastava, 1040 W. 18th Street, Chicago.
